snippet.title: Thief Simulator 2 - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Soon! Follow now - https://ult.ink/TS2

The door to your robber’s career is waiting! Just crowbar the lock off and force your way through the threshold. Learn skills, collect tools and become a master of the thieving trade!

Thief Simulator 2 will debut in 2022 on PC (Steam). In 2023 the game is scheduled to be released on consoles: PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch.
